title: Add creator credit in bottom left corner

requirements.summary: Add a persistent 'made by Saharsh UNIYAL' text label in the bottom left corner visible across all sections
acceptanceCriteria: Text 'made by Saharsh UNIYAL' appears in the bottom left corner
Label is visible on all pages and sections
Text has appropriate styling that ensures readability in both light and dark themes
Label is positioned with fixed or sticky positioning to remain in the bottom left corner

file_operations.description: Create a new CreatorCredit component that renders 'made by Saharsh UNIYAL' with fixed positioning in the bottom left corner. Apply appropriate z-index, padding, and theme-aware text colors using existing CSS variables from index.css to ensure readability in both light and dark themes. Use a small, unobtrusive font size and styling that complements the existing design system.

Import and render the CreatorCredit component at the root level of the App component, positioning it outside the main content flow so it remains visible across all sections and states (including during robot verification). Place it after the RobotVerificationGate and main content rendering to ensure proper layering.
